name: FF4 squared for "MX3" - left side stop/reload/go
description:
NOTICE: There is a known bug on selecting the addressbar via mouse/hover when using this userstyle; I am working on fixing it.  For now you can use keyboard shortcuts "ctrl + A" or "Shift + arrow keys" to select addressbar text.

This version places the stop/reload/go button on left side.  This section of the code was originally written by JC2k8, it's based on this script: http://userstyles.org/styles/47515/firefox-4-stop-go-reload-left-squared-win.  Both FF4 Squared for MX3 and this script would require modifications to work with each other, so I have decided to merge them into one script that readily does that.  This addon is not meant to replace his very nice script, use this only if you are also using the "MX3" theme for Firefox.

For the original version of this userstyle with stop/reload/button on normal right side, see link: http://userstyles.org/styles/46174/firefox-4-squared-for-mx3-theme
additional_info:
This is the firefox 4 squared script, modified to look and work a bit better with the "MX3" Firefox theme. Originally created by "heartripper", modified by me for MX3 compatibility.
I just fixed the bugs with the tabs (not showing properly) and made the backgrounds of the buttons more consistent with the MX3 theme.

Requires Firefox 4.0 or newer to work.

Changelog:
1.0.0 - 4 Apr 2011 - Initial Release
1.0.1 - 5 Apr 2011 - Slight revisions in code
1.1.0 - 7 Apr 2011 - Major change - borders on nav bar fixed for MX3 look, now hover properly
1.1.1 - 7 Apr 2011 - Identity button fixes
1.2.0 - 6 May 2011 - FINAL, all GUI bugs fixed & positioning perfected [Compatible with MX3 theme May 6th update]
1.2.0L - 6 May 2011 - Variant of 1.2.0 with stop/reload/go button on left

Current version: 1.2.0
This version: 1.2.0L

Original description of "FF4 Squared":
"Revamp firefox 4's appearance with a squared look.

Taken from this mockup:

https://bug603790.bugzilla.mozilla.org/attachment.cgi?id=482683 (from https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=603790).

Please note that this is still a work in progress"
______
Original description of "Firefox 4 - Stop/Go/Reload left squared [Win]":

Move the Firefox 4 combined stop/go/reload to the left side of the location bar. Implements a squared style rather than rounded edges like the original. Compatible with the Status-4-Evar extension (v2011.04.06.18+).

Only suitable for the Windows version of Firefox.
This style is intended for personal use only.
